-e ---

# set

see Seth 𓃫 𓃩 𓃪 𓁣

⇨ sit steh ST

𓋴 𓈎 𓌇 set up …
𓋴 𓍊 𓏛 set in order, settle (endowment), confirm

𒀭𒈹𒋝 SIG setting Venus Evening Star

𒊺𒌅 še-tu
𒊺𒌅 to be, leave remaining < set

𒌑𒊺𒈨 ú-še-šib sess- set "place" <> sit sitz seat 𒈨 šib™ 7 𒌑𒊺𒉺𒅁 ú-še-šab sess- set "make sit" :

𒃻𒉆𒈠 𒀸 𒄑𒄖𒍝 𒅗 𒌑𒊺𒉺𒅁
šá-nam-ma ina GIŠ.GU.ZA-ka ú-še-šab someone ina chaisse kyou u'sesshab make someone else sit on your throne.

𒅁𒊺𒁴 ep-še-tim op-set™ 𒅁𒊺𒁴 prepare, set up
